post.name: Audit Officer (contractual)
post.monthly_remuneration: Rs. 50,000/- per month (consolidated). Remuneration will not be a constraint for deserving candidates. TA/DA admissible as per rules for official tour/visit
job_profile: Audit, review, and evaluate the internal control system of the institute and assess adequacy and effectiveness
Perform tasks, consolidate results, and monitor/coordinate with auditors
Assist institute in improvement of internal controls and review of financial/administrative procedures
Assist authorities in interpretation of service rules, CCS rules, and institute rules
Ensure compliance with GFR and other applicable rules & regulations
Inspect, examine, and pre-audit bills before submission to Finance and Accounts Section
Oversee pre, internal, statutory, and C&AG audit and ensure compliance with guidelines
Assist authorities in preparing replies to audit para
Any responsibility assigned by the Institute authority
post.contract_tenure: Initially one year, may extend up to 3 terms based on requirement and satisfactory performance. Total duration including renewals limited to 3 years

qualification.essential: Graduate in any discipline; previous similar experience preferred. Retired Group-A Audit Officer preferred
qualification.desirable: Knowledge of statutory compliance, auditing techniques, internal audit standards issued by ICAI, IIA Certification, CIA, ICAI Certificate on Internal Audit

post.experience: Analogous post in Level-10 for 5 years or Level-9 for 7 years in Audit wing of educational institution of national importance funded by Govt. of India/State Govt/Autonomous bodies/PSU/Universities

documents_required: Date of Birth and Age as on 31-12-2024
application_instructions.submission: Self-attested photocopies of all certificates in a single PDF by 25-02-2025 via email at establishment@nita.ac.in

interview_details.shortlisted_candidates_notification: By return email with tentative date & time
interview_details.documents_to_bring: Filled application form, passport-size photograph, original documents with self-attested copies

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis, fixed pay, initially one year, extendable up to 3 terms, total max 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority final & binding
One month notice or pay in lieu required for leaving during contract
Engagement can be discontinued without reason; does not confer right of continuation
Essential qualification must be from recognized University/Institute/Council
Competent Authority may relax/modify eligibility criteria if candidate otherwise suitable
Canvassing or outside influence liable for rejection
Superannuated employees of Central/State Govt./PSU encouraged to apply
Experience means relevant experience after obtaining minimum educational qualification; experience certificate required
In case of dispute, Director's decision is final & binding
